Class EncodeActionThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • EncodeActionThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class EncodeActionThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    A Thread that contains the application we are going to animate
